name: Extraterrestrial Dinosaur Savior
description:
You play as an alien in his spaceship sent on a mission to protect the earth from a shower of meteors as a means to protect the dinosaurs from certain death. 

Each time a meteor strikes the earth a large amount of dinosaurs die, and once they're all gone, it's Game Over, but if you get hit by any kind of meteors you won't be punished in any way.

Occasionally, you will find a weird box floating around. Destroy it and it will drop one of five Power-ups: Double damage, buffed moon, 5 more missiles, homing lasers and a triple shot.

CONTROLS:

Y - Confirm (Menu)
X - Shoot Lasers
C - Fire Missiles
Escape - Return to Main Menu
